question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: Zakaj je mesto Kota Bogor v Indoneziji znano kot "mesto dežja"?
answer: Kota Bogor v Indoneziji je znano kot "mesto dežja" zaradi svoje izjemno visoke količine padavin skozi vse leto, kar mu daje edinstveno, pogosto mokro podnebje.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor in Indonesia is known as the "City of Rain" because of its exceptionally high rainfall throughout the year, giving it a unique, often wet climate.
